alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Thomas County through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1114 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coolidge, or 10 miles north of Thomasville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Enon, Everett, Patten, Eason, Merrillville, Chastain, Dawesville, Quality, Newark, Pasco and Metcalf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
